Title: Relates to enhancing penalties and protecting victims of crimes of domestic violence
Summary: Relates to enhancing penalties and protecting victims of crimes of domestic violence.
LawCode: Amd Pen L, generally; amd ยง510.30, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to enhancing punishment for crimes involving domestic violence; and to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the consideration of certain factors when determining the issuance of an order of recognizance or bail
